item.title: Bioethics SAARC Nodal Centre at Amrita Institute of Medical Sciences, Kochi
item.description: The Bioethics SAARC Nodal Centre at Amrita Institute of Medical Sciences, Kochi is excited to announce the celebration of World Bioethics Day on the 6th and 7th of October 2023. This year’s theme, ‘Protecting Future Generations,’ draws inspiration from Article 16 of the UNESCO’s Universal Declaration on Bioethics and Human Rights (UDBHR) 2005. The focus is on creating a multidimensional environment that ensures the physical, mental, psychological, social, and moral health of future generations.

item.title: Midterm Skull Base Endoscopy Workshop
item.description: About Amrita Centre for Neuroendoscopy, Kochi, is thrilled to announce a groundbreaking national event set to redefine the landscape of neuroendoscopy. The “Skull Base Endoscopy Cadaver Workshop and Live Spine Endoscopy Surgery,” endorsed by the prestigious Neuroendoscopy Society of India (NESI), is scheduled to take place on September 30 and October 1, 2023, at Amrita Institute of Medical Sciences in Kochi. This high-profile academic gathering is designed to spotlight the most recent advancements in the field of brain and spine neuroendoscopy, uniting delegates and esteemed speakers from across India.
